steps: Click on the candidate's video interview
Verify the interview score and communication score are displayed
expected_result: The interview score and communication score are correctly displayed

steps: Click on the candidate's video interview
Verify the AI-generated summary is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The AI-generated summary is correctly displayed

steps: Click on the candidate's video interview

steps: Create an interview and upload résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify the résumé score is assigned based on skills and experience
expected_result: The résumé screening process is correctly initiated and the résumé score is assigned

steps: Verify the AI recommendations are displayed for each résumé
Verify the recommendation is based on the suitability of the résumé for the job description

title: Verify sending interview link to candidate

Verify the option to send an interview link is available
Verify the interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours
